channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bridge is damaged/missing problem, 29th November
item.description:
handrail on bridleway bridge may be damaged due to fallen tree. - I am not sure if this is our bridge or not, but could you check the rails please? landowner is going to remove tree
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Repeat report: Path needs levelling tamac, 29th November
item.description:
See photos of marked path with white paint showing 20m length of path. It's a hazard trying to cycle or run on the edge of the path due to racking and sinking . Location starts at light No 22 Up Hatherley Way.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Up Hatherley Way, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 29th November
item.description:
Customer reports that some drains in the location are blocked and the carriageway has flooded; some of the carriageway has started to break up as well. They add that in the recent freezing weather, the water froze and became very dangerous. They fear that an accident will happen if this is not addressed - particularly if it freezes again.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole opposite the side exit and entrance of Cheltenham Spa station. Main road pothole. About 2m from main pedestrian crossing, 29th November
item.description:
Pothole opposite the side exit and entrance of Cheltenham Spa station. Main road pothole. About 2m from main pedestrian crossing. Opposite the food retail outlets. **Please be advised that this pothole has now been repaired** However must have been recently repaired and unfortunately caused subsequent damage to my vehicle prior to the repair of the pothole. I wish to raise a claim in accordance with the Highways Act 1980.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 259, Gloucester Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous or intimidating animals problem, 29th November
item.description:
reports of multiple walkers/pedestrians being injured/trampled by cattle from within field. owner has been made aware multiple times and appears to have made no alterations or concerns of issue apart from a small sign into field warning about cattle. (extra signage has been added to field by a victim)
Report on FixMyStreet
